div.head: 大小便難
div.div: major and minor relief with difficulty; difficult urination and defecation

bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

entry.def: major and minor relief with difficulty; difficult urination and defecation

sense.def: Illness Sign Combined Designation of xiao bian nan 小便難 , difficult urination, and da bian nan 大便 難 , difficult defecation. Zhu bing yuan hou lun 諸病源候論 6: 熱氣乘於大小腸，大小腸痞澀，故大小便 難也 , “When heat qi avails itself of the large and small intestines, then the large and small intestines have an obstacle-illness and passage is rough. Hence urination and defecation are difficult ”.
